title: Tandem Theory Publishes 2025 Consumer Trends Report
statement: Tandem Theory released 'Tandem Pulse: 2025 Consumer Trends' report in January 2025 titled 'Navigating the Year of Contradictions'.

citations.quote: Tandem Pulse: 2025 Consumer Trends January 23, 2025 Explore Tandem Pulse: Navigating the Year of Contradictions to uncover the strategies, insights, and trends you need to stay ahead.
